message: We know this. What are YOU doing about it?!? He called you """"Lying Ted"""" for a year and insulted your wife. Are you standing up to him??
Wow!

A 2700 year old papyrus mentioning Jerusalem written in paleo-Hebrew is as much a treasure of Palestinian history as it is of Jewish history, as it is of world history. Propping it up as a exclusively Jewish artifact because it's in Hebrew (as if Palestinian history can't include the Jewish history of Palestine) is as absurd as the denigration of Arabic as a non-Jewish language, when in fact some of the great works of Jewish philosophy and poetry are in Arabic. To draw nationalist, sectarian lines around complex, multifaceted cultural products ignores the deep connections of all peoples in the region.
Tatiana Cuevas James Cuevas Charles Fanning

Wait--so everyone is freaking out and bashing Walmart because of a RUMOR? Are you serious right now? Are we in high school? Or has this actually become middle school? this is THE WORST bunch of cry babies I've ever seen. First of all- Walmart doesn't close a store because of a rumor (this is not responsible news reporting so lets make this news source know that). Second-- if that store is MAKING MONEY they also won't close a store. How many walmarts across this nation are dry and they still make money. (Let me answer that for you HUNDREDS.) So before you start bashing a retailer that brings more revenue and jobs than most other retailers in that community id say you are a bunch of ungrateful residence. Do your research and stop believing everything you read on the Internet. ðŸ„
